pr_title: DB-10383 Dropping an expression-based index also drops its statistics

timeline.message: DB-10383 Dropping an expression-based index also drops its statistics

timeline.bodyText: We may need to broadcast the ALTER_STATS messages to invalidate the plans based on that stats too and remove the entry from the dictionary cache. See StatisticsAdmin.ddlNotification().
